posts.post_title: Wanted To Buy - T206 Speaker with Various Backs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Brailey
Looking to purchase or trade for T206 Speakers with the following backs:

Cycle 350
Carolina Bright
Drum
El Prinipe de Gales
Old Mill
Sweet Caporal 350 Series  Factory 25
Sweet Caporal 350 Series Factory 30

Have many other T206 HOF'ers with various backs to trade.  Also have duplicates of Speaker Tolstoi and Polar Bear.  Also have many other vintage cards to trade.

Please send inquiries to mikebrailey@yahoo.com
Thanks,
Mike
